p: Preliminary quantitative analysis of IGESE showing the relative abundance and quantification of secondary metabolites (expressed in mg/100 g of dry IGESE) shows the presence of phenol (57.18 ± 0.05), flavonoids (18.19 ± 0.07), alkaloids (50.51 ± 0.17), steroids (47.47 ± 0.03), tannin (41.60 ± 0.03), and reducing sugars (65.64 ± 0.23) ( Table 2).
